DOC.brief_summary: The purpose current study evaluate effect preimplantation genetic screening ( PGS ) next generation sequencing ( NGS ) compare standard morphological assessment embryos pregnancy rate randomize control trial ( RCT ) . All embryos vitrify single embryo transfer ( SET ) perform either screen unscreened embryo depend randomization .
DOC.criteria: Patient undergo IVF At least 2 blastocyst suitable biopsy day 5 6 embryo development History two prior implantation failure follow IVF History one miscarriage viable pregnancy One partner know carrier ( ) chromosomal abnormality Known genetic carrier couple and/or one partner carrier know autosomal dominant disorder Any nonstudy related preimplantation genetic testing Use donor oocyte Use gestational carrier ( surrogate donor egg recipient ) . Severe oligospermia ( < 1,000,000 sperm/ml ) ; Surgical Sperm Retrieval reason postvasectomy CAVD Low ovarian reserve ( FSH ) > 10 IU/L day 24 prior menstrual cycle and/or ( AMH ) < 7 pmol/L ( < 1 ng/ml ) Gender selection cycle Concurrent participation another clinical trial
